data.actual_result: The formatting either gets ignored from what I can tell or it escapes it in a weird way causing it to look abnormal <(http://imgur.com/a/cH5C7>)
data.short_description: Formatting in Audit Log causes half escaping or ingorance of formatting in the log entry.
data.steps_to_repro: - Change a channel description to something with bold, or italics in it. - Look at the entry for it in the Audit Log - See how it either doesn't escape the formatting correctly (bold) or it just causes none of the formatting to work (italic)
